circle.style: stroke: rgb(0,0,0); stroke-width: 2; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-miterlimit: 4; fill: none; fill-rule: nonzero; opacity: 1;

path.style: stroke: rgb(0,0,0); stroke-width: 2; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-miterlimit: 4; fill: none; fill-rule: nonzero; opacity: 1;
